# esame delle variabili (input VS output)

leggiamo i dati dal file .pkl

```{python loading_dati}
import pandas as pd
df <- pd.read_pkl('/data/metalm/.pkl')

                       
```

# tool wear VS variabili di input

```{python plotting variabili}

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.style.use('seaborn')

output = 'tool_wear'

features = list(df.columns())
features = features.remove(output)

for ff in features:
  plt.figure()
  plt.plot(df[ff],df[output],'-bv')
  plt.xlabel(ff)
  plt.ylabel(output)
  plt.title(ff+' VS '+output)
  
  plt.show()

plt.style.use('default')
```
